data.title: Notice of publication in the US information magazine "Newsweek" (international edition)
data.text:
An interview with President Kazunori Toshioka was published in "Newsweek (international edition)" published on September 30, 2022.

Interview outline

We are talking about the state-of-the-art technology that our company, which has been in business for 75 years, and the future potential of safety shoes.

In particular, Simon's flagship model SX 3-layer sole product is designed with a concept that emphasizes health, so that you can be satisfied not only with excellent slip resistance but also with comfort. The desire to continue to be a manufacturer that aldelivers safety,comfort,and health is posted.

About Newsweek, a US business magazine

Newsweek is a leading American information magazine founded in 1933. It is published in 59 countries around the world and has 55 million subscribers.
